AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.label: Frost Breath
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can channel the biting chill of frost into their body, unleashing rapid and devastating ice-based attacks fueled by their inner breath. Their power brings frigid winds and piercing cold to the battlefield.
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.resourceDescription: Current stored Breath, charged with the essence of frost. This energy powers devastating ice-based abilities, freezing enemies in their tracks.
